question: Which task sounds most interesting to you in engineering?

options.a: Designing and creating detailed 3D models of parts or machines
options.b: Writing step-by-step instructions to solve problems or control devices
options.c: Building and testing electronic circuits and gadgets

question: When you think about technology, what excites you most?

options.a: Making machines work automatically with minimal human help
options.b: Designing efficient processes to make products faster and better
options.c: Connecting devices and systems so they communicate smoothly

question: What type of project would you enjoy working on?

options.a: Creating a new mechanical part using computer software
options.b: Programming small devices to perform specific tasks
options.c: Designing and testing electronic components and circuits

question: Which skill would you like to improve the most?

options.a: Using software to design and visualize engineering projects
options.b: Writing efficient code to control hardware and automate tasks
options.c: Understanding how electronic parts work together in circuits

question: How do you prefer to solve technical problems?

options.a: By designing a precise mechanical or electronic solution
options.b: By programming devices or systems to behave as needed
options.c: By optimizing processes or improving system connections

question: Which statement best matches your interests?

options.a: I enjoy building things that physically move or perform tasks
options.b: I like writing code that makes machines smarter and more efficient
options.c: I prefer making systems run smoothly and communicate well

question: What kind of tools or technology do you like working with?

options.a: Computer programs for designing parts or machines

question: When you think about industry or factories, what interests you most?

options.a: Designing machines or tools that improve production
options.b: Creating automated systems that reduce manual work
options.c: Planning and improving processes for better efficiency

question: Which challenge would you be most excited to take on?

options.a: Designing a mechanical system from scratch using CAD software
options.b: Writing algorithms that control how devices behave
options.c: Building and troubleshooting an electronic circuit

question: What do you enjoy most about technology?

options.a: Seeing how parts fit and work together in machines
options.b: Programming and controlling devices with code
options.c: Ensuring different systems and devices communicate properly
